grow_event_type_Electric/3901_1301_0100_:
I look forward to seeing the techniques that
you’ve honed in battle.
grow_event_type_Electric/3902_1031_0100_:
Passion is key—
even when practicing.
grow_event_type_Electric/3902_1301_0100_:
If you’re taking on Siebold of the Kalos Elite Four,
I can lend you a hand.
grow_event_type_Electric/3903_1031_0100_:
Ambition to keep growing
stronger is essential.
grow_event_type_Electric/3903_1301_0100_: Let’s see how bright your light can shine in battle!
